str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
From ana and the base of agkale; constraint; by implication, distress.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a figure, copy, (b) an example, model. From hupodeiknumi; an exhibit for imitation or warning.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To cleanse, make clean, literally, ceremonially, or spiritually, according to context. From katharos; to cleanse.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From epi and ouranos; above the sky.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Stronger, more excellent. Comparative of a derivative of kratos; stronger, i.e. better, i.e. Nobler.
Abstr. and concr: sacrifice; a sacrifice, offering. From thuo; sacrifice.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
